Package de.mrapp.android.adapter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Adapter<AdapterViewType extends <any>>
    Defines the interface, all adapters must implement.
    ExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>
    Defines the interface, an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, must implement.
    Filter<DataType>
    Defines the interface, a class, which should allow to filter instances of a specific type by using a regular expression, must implement.
    Filterable
    Defines the interface, a class, which should support filtering by using regular expressions, must implement.
    FilterQuery
    A representation of a query, which has been used to filter an adapter's underlying data.
    ListAdapter<DataType>
    Defines the interface, an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items, must implement.
    MultipleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>
    Defines the interface, an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which multiple items can be selected at once, must implement.
    MultipleChoiceListAdapter<DataType>
    Defines the interface, an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items, of which multiple items can be selected at once, must implement.
    RecyclerViewAdapter
    Defines the interface, all adapters, which can be attached to a RecyclerView, must implement.
    SingleChoiceExpandableListAdapter<GroupType,ChildType>
    Defines the interface, an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items, of which only one single item can be selected at once, must implement.
    SingleChoiceListAdapter<DataType>
    Defines the interface, an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary items, of which only one single item can be selected at once, must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdapterFactory
    An utility class, which offers factory methods, which allow to initialize instances of the types ListAdapter, SingleChoiceListAdapter or MultipleChoiceListAdapter.
    BuildConfig  
    ExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType>
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of an ExpandableListAdapter.
    ListDecorator<DataType>
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the view, which is used to visualize the items of a ListAdapter.
    R  
    R.attr  
    R.bool  
    R.dimen  
    R.id  
    R.integer  
    R.layout  
    R.styleable  
    R.xml  
    SelectableExpandableListDecorator<GroupType,ChildType>
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the views, which are used to visualize the group and child items of an SelectableExpandableListAdapter.
    SelectableListDecorator<DataType>
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which should allow to customize the appearance of the view, which is used to visualize the items of a SelectableListAdapter.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChoiceMode
    Contains all possible choice modes of an adapter, whose underlying data is managed as a list of arbitrary group and child items.
    Order
    Contains all possible orders, which may be used to sort the items of a ListAdapter.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FilteringNotSupportedException
    An exception, which is thrown, if the items of an adapter should be filtered, but the underlying data does not implement the interface Filterable.
    SortingNotSupportedException
    An exception, which is thrown, if the items of an adapter should be sorted, but the underlying data does not implement the interface Comparable.
